Metadata.title: FitMyCV — Tailor your resume to every job posting with AI
Metadata.description: Upload your resume, paste a job posting link, and let AI optimize your application to maximize your chances. PDF and Word export in seconds.

Hero.title: Your resume, optimized by AI
phrases: No more copy-pasting — just paste a URL
No subscription — pay as you go

HowItWorks.intro: FitMyCV uses AI to optimize your resume to match each job posting. It adapts the content to ATS format and generates a resume that passes ATS filters and lands you more interviews.
HowItWorks.title:
Upload your resume, paste a job posting,
get an optimized resume.
HowItWorks.subtitle: Upload your resume, paste a job posting, get an optimized resume.

steps.label: PDF Import
steps.title: Upload your resume
steps.desc: Drag and drop your PDF or upload it. AI automatically extracts your skills, experience, and education in seconds.

steps.label: AI Generation
steps.title: AI Generation
steps.desc: Add job posting URLs. AI generates resume variants tailored to each target position.

steps.label: Review changes
steps.title: Review changes
steps.desc: View each AI-suggested change with a clear diff. Accept, reject, or adjust — you stay in full control.

steps.label: Match score
steps.title: Match score
steps.desc: A score evaluates the match between your resume and the target posting. See exactly where you can improve.

steps.label: Targeted optimization
steps.title: Targeted optimization
steps.desc: AI tells you exactly what to improve to boost your score. Select the suggestions that fit you and add your own notes.

steps.label: Final review
steps.title: Final review
steps.desc: Review the applied optimizations and watch your score climb. From 79 to 87 — every point counts.

steps.label: PDF / Word Export
steps.title: PDF / Word Export
steps.desc: Preview your finalized resume and export it in the format of your choice. Ready to send, perfectly formatted.

Pricing.title:
<highlight>No subscription.</highlight>
Pay for what you use.
Pricing.subtitle: 15 free credits on sign-up.
Pricing.calcQuestion: How many job postings are you targeting this month?
Pricing.calcNote2: Estimate based on the typical resume creation workflow
Pricing.launchNote: 15 free credits · No credit card required

items.question: Will AI replace my content?
items.answer: No. The AI does not fabricate skills or experiences. It works exclusively from the information you provide: it rephrases, reorganizes, and optimizes content with ATS formatting in mind. The review mode lets you validate each change, and the online editor gives you full control over the final result.

items.question: Will my resume be ATS-compatible?
items.answer: Yes. The resume structure, keyword selection, and section hierarchy are designed to be correctly parsed by Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS). When your profile warrants it, the AI incorporates relevant terms from the job posting to strengthen the match with recruiter filters.

items.question: Is my data protected?
items.answer: Your resumes and personal data are encrypted and never shared with third parties or used to train AI models. You can delete your account and all your data at any time. FitMyCV complies with GDPR.

items.question: Is there a free trial?
items.answer: Yes. You receive 15 free credits when you create your account, with no credit card required. This lets you generate multiple resumes and test all features before purchasing additional credits.

items.question: Which job platforms are supported?
items.answer: FitMyCV works with any publicly accessible job posting that doesn't require authentication: Indeed, Welcome to the Jungle, France Travail, and many other platforms. Just paste the job URL. For sites requiring login (LinkedIn, etc.), a browser extension is under development — it will let you generate a resume directly from the job page, using the source resume of your choice.

items.question: How is FitMyCV different from ChatGPT?
items.answer: If you ask ChatGPT to tailor your resume to a job posting, it will often make things up: a skill you don't have, a task you never performed, just to match the role. You notice it when proofreading — or worse, during an interview. Then you have to fix it, re-prompt, re-check… for every single application. FitMyCV works exclusively from your actual background and shows you every change before validation. The result: a faithful, optimized resume ready to send — in minutes, not hours.

items.question: What formats are supported?
items.answer: You can import an existing resume as a PDF via drag and drop. After generation or editing, export is available in PDF and Word (.docx), ready to be attached to an application or uploaded to a job platform.

items.question: How many resumes can I create?
items.answer: There is no limit. Each resume generation consumes credits. Upon registration, you receive 15 free credits to try the tool. After that, you purchase credits on demand based on your needs — no subscription, no commitment.

items.question: In how many languages can I create my resume?
items.answer: The interface and resume translation are currently available in 4 languages: French, English, Spanish, and German. More languages will be added progressively. You can translate an existing resume into another language with one click, preserving the layout and content.

items.question: Can I edit my resume after generation?
items.answer: Yes. The online editor lets you modify each section directly in the browser. The review mode displays AI suggestions as proposals that you can accept or reject individually before finalizing your resume.

items.question: What is the match score?
items.answer: It is a percentage indicator that measures the fit between your resume and a job posting. The algorithm compares your profile's skills, experience, and keywords against the position's requirements. Along with the score, targeted recommendations tell you how to improve the match.

Support.metaDescription: Find all the answers to your questions about FitMyCV: AI-powered resume generation, ATS compatibility, formats, pricing, data protection, and more.
Support.heading: Help Center
Support.subtitle: Everything you need to know about FitMyCV

Terms.s1p1: By using FitMyCV.io and purchasing credits, you unconditionally accept these Terms of Sale.
Terms.s1p2: If you do not accept these terms, please do not use our paid services.
Terms.s1p3: Use of FitMyCV.io is restricted to individuals aged 16 and over.
Terms.s2p1: FitMyCV.io is a resume creation and optimization platform powered by artificial intelligence.
s2_1Items: Resume storage in your personal workspace
s2_2Items: Resume import and extraction from PDF
Terms.s2_3p1: When you create your account, you receive a default number of credits allowing you to test the platform's features.
Terms.s2_3p2: Each feature consumes a variable number of credits according to a defined rate schedule. The credit cost of each feature is displayed before use.
Terms.s2_3p3: Credits do not expire and remain valid as long as your account is active.
Terms.s2_3p4: When your credits run out, you can purchase more from the <creditsLink>Credit Management</creditsLink> page.
Terms.s3p1: All prices are displayed in euros (EUR). The publisher is exempt from VAT pursuant to Article 293 B of the French General Tax Code (Code Général des Impôts).
Terms.s3p2: Payments are secured by Stripe and accept credit cards, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and other payment methods depending on your location.
Terms.s3p3: Credit pack pricing is available on the <creditsLink>Credit Management</creditsLink> page.
Terms.s4p1: In accordance with Article L.221-28 of the French Consumer Code, the User acknowledges and agrees that the provision of Services begins immediately upon order confirmation.
Terms.s4p2: Consequently, the User expressly waives their right of withdrawal for any credit purchase.
Terms.s4Highlight: Important: Confirming the order after checking the withdrawal waiver box constitutes an express waiver of this right.
Terms.s5p1: All credit purchases are final once the service has been used (resume generation, export, translation, etc.). By making a purchase, you acknowledge having read and accepted this clause.
Terms.s5p2: In case of a technical issue preventing the use of the service, contact our support at <supportEmail>support@fitmycv.io</supportEmail>. We will review your situation on a case-by-case basis.
Terms.s6p1: In the event of a chargeback (payment dispute filed with your bank) after using the service:
s6Items: The amount of disputed credits will be deducted from your balance, which may become negative.
You will need to top up your account to continue using credit-based services.
Terms.s6Highlight: Warning: Abusive chargebacks may result in permanent account suspension.
Terms.s7p1: FitMyCV.io acts as a "deployer" of an artificial intelligence system within the meaning of European Regulation 2024/1689 (AI Act).
s7_1Items: Resume import and extraction from PDF
Terms.s7_2p1: Results generated by AI are suggestions and do not constitute binding recommendations in any way. The user retains full control over the final content of their resumes.
Terms.s7_3p1: AI features are provided by OpenAI (United States). Data transmitted to OpenAI is not used to train their models in accordance with their API policy.
Terms.s7Highlight: AI Transparency: The user is informed that generated content originates from an artificial intelligence system. This content should be reviewed before use.
Terms.s8p1: Resumes you create via FitMyCV.io belong to you. You retain all rights to the content you provide.
Terms.s8p2: The interface, source code, algorithms, and all elements of FitMyCV.io are the exclusive property of the publisher and are protected by copyright law.
Terms.s9p1: Services are provided "as is", without warranty of any kind, express or implied.
s9Items: The absence of technical errors or bugs
Compatibility of generated resumes with all ATS (Applicant Tracking Systems)
Obtaining an interview or employment as a result of using the service
The accuracy or relevance of AI-generated content
Terms.s9p3: Maintenance operations may be performed without prior notice, resulting in temporary service interruptions.
Terms.s9p4: Our liability is limited to the amount you have paid for the service during the past 12 months.
s10Items: Any attempt to intrude into systems
Use of bots or automated scripts
Any use contrary to public decency or public order
Creation of illegal, defamatory content or content infringing on the rights of third parties
Terms.s10Highlight: Sanctions: In case of violation, FitMyCV.io reserves the right to suspend or delete the account without prior notice or refund.
Terms.s11p1: You can delete your account at any time from your personal settings or by contacting us at <supportEmail>support@fitmycv.io</supportEmail>.
Terms.s11p2: Account deletion results in the permanent deletion of all your data (resumes, job postings, history) in accordance with our <privacyLink>Privacy Policy</privacyLink>.
Terms.s11Highlight: Unused credits: Remaining credits on your account are forfeited upon deletion and cannot be refunded or transferred.
Terms.s12p1: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. Changes will be published on this page with the update date. Continued use of the service after modification constitutes acceptance of the new terms.
Terms.s13p1: In accordance with Articles L.616-1 and R.616-1 of the French Consumer Code, in the event of a dispute, the User may resort to a consumer mediator free of charge.
Terms.s13p2: The name and contact details of the relevant mediator will be provided upon request at <contactEmail>contact@fitmycv.io</contactEmail>.
Terms.s13Highlight: ODR Platform: You may also use the European Commission's Online Dispute Resolution platform: https://ec.europa.eu/consumers/odr
Terms.s14p1: These Terms are governed by French law.
Terms.s14p2: In the event of a dispute, and after an attempt at amicable resolution, the courts of Paris shall have exclusive jurisdiction.

Privacy.s1p1: Codeglyph publishes the FitMyCV.io website and, in this capacity, collects and processes personal data about you.
Privacy.s1Infobox:
Codeglyph
SIRET: 995 375 862 00019
200 rue de la Croix Nivert, 75015 Paris
Email: <contactEmail>contact@codeglyph.fr</contactEmail>
Privacy.s2p1: FitMyCV.io is intended for individuals aged 16 and over. By using this service, you confirm that you meet the age requirement.
Privacy.s3p1: Under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), you have the following rights:

s3Rights.title: Access
s3Rights.desc: view the personal data we hold about you

s3Rights.title: Erasure
s3Rights.desc: request the deletion of your data ("right to be forgotten")

s3Rights.title: Restriction
s3Rights.desc: restrict the processing of your data

s3Rights.title: Portability
s3Rights.desc: receive your data in a structured format

s3Rights.title: Objection
s3Rights.desc: object to processing on legitimate grounds

Privacy.s3p2: To exercise these rights, contact us at <contactEmail>contact@codeglyph.fr</contactEmail>. We will respond within 30 days.
Privacy.s3p3: In the event of a dispute, you may file a complaint with the <cnilLink>CNIL</cnilLink> (French Data Protection Authority).
s4_1Items: Profile picture (if signed in via Google, Apple, or GitHub)
s4_2Items: Contact details: phone, address, professional links
Imported documents (PDF): not retained, transmitted to OpenAI for extraction then immediately deleted
s4_4Items: No banking data stored (managed exclusively by Stripe)
s6TableRows: As long as the account exists
3 years after last login (30-day notice before deletion)
Privacy.s8p1: FitMyCV.io uses artificial intelligence to generate and optimize your resumes. Your resume data (experience, skills, education) is transmitted to:
Privacy.s8p2: OpenAI states that data transmitted via its API is not used to train its models.
Privacy.s8_autoP: AI is used to calculate resume-job match scores, classify your skills, and suggest improvements. These processes are decision-support tools: you retain full control over the final content of your resumes.
Privacy.s9p1: Payments are processed by Stripe Payments Europe, Ltd. (Ireland). FitMyCV.io never stores complete credit card numbers.
Privacy.s10p1: Transactional emails (verification, password reset, confirmations) are sent via Resend.
Privacy.s11p1: FitMyCV.io uses essential cookies required for the site to function (session, authentication, anti-spam protection). No advertising cookies are used.
Privacy.s12p1: We implement the following measures to protect your data:
s12Items: Anti-spam protection via Google reCAPTCHA v3
Privacy.s12p2: reCAPTCHA collects technical data (IP address, cookies, browsing behavior) to distinguish humans from bots. Google's <googlePrivacyLink>Privacy Policy</googlePrivacyLink> and Terms of Service apply.
Privacy.s13p1: Some data may be transferred outside the European Union (OpenAI, Resend in the United States). These transfers are governed by Standard Contractual Clauses approved by the European Commission.
Privacy.s14p1: This policy may be modified at any time. Changes will be published on this page with the update date. In the event of a substantial modification, you will be notified by email.
